title: 关于MythicMobs更新公告的问题
author: 李一笑
txt_content:
daodi.png (39.22 KB, 下载次数: 3)

下载附件

2015-11-22 09:39 上传




就是这玩意 怎么删除

replies.author: xiangnian
replies.txt_content:
打开MythicMobs插件的config配置文件
# 
# CONFIGURATION INFORMATION AVAILABLE AT: http://xikage.elseland.net/mythicmobs/

general:
  check-for-updates: true  #把这里填写为false即可关闭
  compatibility-mode: false
  debug-level: 0
  clock-interval: 5
  save-interval: 1
  spawns-interval: 1
  scan-interval: 10
  use-volatile-features: true
mobs:
  enable-timer-skills: true
  enable-threat-tables: true
  show-health-radius: 25
  show-health-format: $mobname - $percent ($mobhp / $mobmaxhp)
metrics:
  allow: true
compatibility:
  heroes-xp-enable: false
  heroes-show-xp-message: true
  heroes-xp-message-format: You receive $xp experience for slaying $mobname
  mcmmo-show-xp-message: false
  mcmmo-xp-message-format: You receive $xp experience for slaying $mobname
  skillapi-show-xp-message: true
  skillapi-xp-message-format: §e你杀死 $mobname §e获得了§a $xp §e点经验值
  vault-show-money-message: true
  vault-money-message-format: §e你杀死了 $mobname §e获得了§a $money §e灵石
